text: How do you guys feel about "tie and untie" ? Or in a sentence: Tie nodes into an expression. Untie an expression into nodes. I could probably come up with a better icon (a bow tie). I don't mind it being a bit playful, But I'm not native English, so I don't now if it's too weird.
